caption.p: General morphology of plants. ( A) PSRU-RUT001 (foliage of unknown plant species), ( B), Clausena excavata plant (PSRU-RUT003), ( C) Fruits of C. excavata, ( D) flowers of C. excavata, ( E) Clausena harmandiana plant (PSRU-RUT005), ( F) Fruits of C. harmandiana and ( G) flowers of C. harmandiana.
